item.description:
A nice low-key show to start things off. One of those shows where you take a chance and hope they are good live.

They've added three more acts to the night. The Doom Buggies will be the headliner. Below, you can find links to the bands MySpace page or official website.

The Doom Buggies

The Dirty Truckers

AMSTEREO

Ginsko Method

$8 cover. Show starts at 9pm, but we'll be there at 8:30 to talk and get to know one another. I understand this is a Thursday and I may be the only person who shows up.

NOTE: If you don't RSVP, I won't be looking for you, so please, even if you might come, please RSVP and let me know.

Abbey Lounge
item.name: The Doom Buggies, The Dirty Truckers, AMSTEREO and Ginsko Method @ Abbey Lounge
